name: Recycle

effect.text: Flip a coin. If heads, put a card in your discard pile on top of your deck.

strengths: Can recover ANY card from discard pile
Puts card on top of deck for guaranteed draw
Flexible - works with Pokemon, Trainers, Energy
weaknesses: Only recovers one card on success

competitiveHistory: Recycle offered flexibility in recovering any card type from the discard pile, but the coin flip made it unreliable. More consistent recovery options like Energy Retrieval or Item Finder were generally preferred. It saw niche play when recovering specific key cards was essential.

rulings.ruling: If heads, you may put ANY card from your discard pile on top of your deck.
If tails, nothing happens and Recycle is discarded.
You must have at least one card in your discard pile to play Recycle.
